sentences.sentence: Our chefs use only the freshest produce available.
sentences.translation: 我们的厨师只用现有最新鲜的农产品。

sentences.sentence: I always serve the freshest possible food and I make the atmosphere as comfortable and as pleasant as I can, so that my customers will want to come back.
sentences.translation: 我总是尽量提供最新鲜的食物，并尽可能让环境变得舒适愉快，这样我的顾客们就会愿意再次光顾。

sentences.sentence: The freshest fish smell after three days.
sentences.translation: 再鲜的鱼三天也会变臭。
